Gothic.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the Gothic style of building was common in Western Europe between the 12th and 16th centuries and included tall pointed arches and windows and tall pillars
Gothic.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a Gothic story, film etc is about frightening things that happen in mysterious old buildings and lonely places, in a style that was popular in the early 19th century
Gothic.translation[0].definitions[2].def: Gothic writing, printing etc has thick decorated letters
